channel.title: Missing Values on Masumbuko Semba's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Missing Values on Masumbuko Semba's Blog

item.title: Convert incorrect filled missing values to NA in R data frame
item.description: One of the most important components of a data management strategy is the proper handling of missing values. Often you will find datasets that have used either zero or NA to represent missing values in cell of a data frame or table. Everyone who deals with data has to deal with this important distinction. And far too often people get it wrong. Spreadsheet software like Microsoft Excel (Kraus 2014) and OpenOffice Calc (Oualline and Oualline 2018) is ubiquitous.
